sent.orig: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow will be our doubts of today.
sent.trans: 实现明天理想的唯一障碍是今天的疑虑。

sent.orig: Free limit [ IBRD] : The limit on a free-limit loan.
sent.trans: 自由限额[国际复兴开发银行]：对自由发放的贷款的限度。

sent.orig: Theorem 1 (Uniqueness of Limit) If the sequence is convergent, then its limit is unique.
sent.trans: 定理1（极限的唯一性）如果数列收敛，那么它的极限唯一。

sent.orig: AC. mechanical limIt'structure, exact limIt'setting steady and reliable.
sent.trans: 交流。机械限位结构，精确定位，稳定可靠。

sent.orig: Moreover users can set some parameters such as power factor upper limit limit and so on.
sent.trans: 同时用户可根据需要设定功率因数上、下限，过电压值等参数。
